DOC.criteria: Female gender Available reliable follow Able complete study assessment Mammogram within last year Menopausal ( least 12 month since last spontaneous menstrual bleeding ) Age < 18 year Dementia inability follow instruction Prior pelvic floor radiation History uterine , ovarian , fallopian tube , breast , colon cancer Current use use within last 6 month estrogen ( vaginal , oral , transdermal , compound ) Current use alternative medicine include black cohosh , even primrose , dong quai , chasteberry Known prothrombotic mutation Factor V Leiden , prothrombin mutation , protein C Protein S deficiency History current thrombophelbitis venous thromboembolic disorder Currently use fluconazole rifampin
